text: Get Me Bodied Singel Beyoncé from the album B'Day Released July 10 2007r. (U.S.) September 24 2007r. (U.K.) Genre R&B; Length 3:25 (album version) 4:01 (radio edit) 5:59 (original extended mix) 6:18 (deluxe album version) Label Columbia Records Writer Swizz Beatz, Angela Beyince, Sean Garrett, Beyoncé Knowles, Solange Knowles, Makeba Riddick Producer Swizz Beatz, Sean Garrett, Beyoncé Beyoncé singles chronology Suga mama (2007r.) Get Me Bodied Amor Gitano (2007r.) B'Day track listing Déjà vu (1) Get Me Bodied (2) Suga mama (3) B'Day Deluxe Edition CD track listing If (8) Get Me Bodied (9) Freakum Dress (10) Get Me Bodied is a song written by Beyoncé Knowles, Sean Garrett, Solange Knowles, Angela Beyince, Makeba Riddick, and Swizz Beatz for Knowles' second studio album, B'Day (2006). Produced by Swizz Beatz, Sean Garrett, and Beyoncé, it was released as the album's fifth single in the United States on July 10, 2007,Billboard.com "Get Me Bodied Single Information" and has since reached number 68 on the U.S. Billboard Hot 100. == Formats and tracklisting == === CD single === #"Radio Edit" – 4:01 #"Extended Mix" – 6:19 === CD ringle === #"Extended Mix" – 6:21 #"Timbaland Remix (feat. Voltio)" – 6:17 #"Timbaland Remix (feat. Fabolous)" – 4:50 ==Chart== Chart (2007r.) Position Portugal National Top 50 45 U.S. Billboard Hot 100 68 U.S. Billboard Hot R&B;/Hip-Hop Songs 10 U.S. Billboard Pop 100 89 Brazil Hot 100 Singles 25 ==Notes== Category:Beyoncé songs Category:2007 songs
title: Get Me Bodied
